DOC.brief_summary: This study consist two clinical series . With first series investigator monitor heal skin graft bioimpedance measurement . The bioimpedance measurement do purpose build patch electrode contact wound reference electrode . In second series investigator monitor close operational wound ( breast reconstruction surgery patient ) bioimpedance measurement . This series also conduct bioimpedance measurement wound operational wound . Both group 20 patient .
DOC.brief_title: Bioimpedance Based Monitoring Operation Wound Skin Graft Healing
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives study : 1 . The investigator study bioimpedance measurement result correlate conventional wound heal monitoring . 2 . The investigator seek best method handle , interpret present bioimpedance measurement result . 3 . The investigator find impedance measurement applicable clinical use .
DOC.criteria: patient skin graft operation make part treatment patient breast reconstruction surgery make part treatment pregnancy patient limited capacity understand information regard study patient chronic skin disease operation area
